title: SHORTCUT COCONUT ALMOND MACAROONS
directions: Line baking sheets with silicone baking mats or parchment paper.
Mix on medium speed for about 3 minutes the cake mix, water and almond extract. Slowly mix in coconut and almonds.
Scoop in 2 tablespoons at a time and drop onto baking sheets about 2 inches apart.
Bake at top of oven for 20 to 22 minutes, until very lightly browned.
Cool for a few minutes before removing from baking sheets. (NOTE: For a prettier look, cut the cookies with a round biscuit cutter to trim off browned edges.)
ingredients: 1 box (16 ounces) angel food cake mix
